About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri and by appointment; closed Sun, Good Friday and Christmas - New Year period. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3, photographs, maps and plans.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit and reason for request required. Proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: Data pertaining to district history; personal collections from local residents. (90% in-house).

About.Major holdings: Sporting bodies: Score books, minutes etc. Shire History Records. Business account books 1890- . Maps etc, plans, photographs 1900s- .
